## Release Flatcar Container Linux <Alpha-VERSION> [<Beta-VERSION>] [>Stable-VERSION>]
  
The release of Flatcar Container Linux <VERSION> [<VERSION> ...] is planned for <MONTH> <DAY>, <YEAR>.
